Content.Sentence:
I often get into a panic at airports, but my most recent experience was a classic example! After arrive at the airport with my girlfriend, we queued up at the check-in desk and got our boarding passes. Having get our boarding passes, we went through the security gate. While gone through the metal detector, I suddenly heard a loud alarm and saw lots of flashing lights. Before allow me through, the security officer insisted on searching me thoroughly. I had forgotten that there was a penknife in my pocket. It was very embarrassing!
After that we went through to the departure gate and waited for our flight. While waited, we decided to have a snack and some coffee. Hadfinished our snack, we went to look at the duty free shops. We chose some French perfume and I went to the cash desk to pay while my girlfriend went to the toilet. On reach into my pocket to get out my card, I realised it wasn't there. I was sure I had had it with me when I arrived at the airport. Then I remembered. Before go through the metal detector, I had given my wallet to my girlfriend. So I had to wait for her to come back from the toilet before I could pay. Yet again I felt like a complete idiot!
